Nicolette:
My firm is putting forward two nominees to backfill my position so I can retire. As it stands right now, the contract leadership wants me to stay on fulltime for a transition period with the new incumbent until the end of the option year on 31 May 2012. We are expecting a contract extension, which will mean the new incumbent for my job will continue into the following year and we will not have to do a second transition or a period of my covering teaching commitments while a new team comes on board.
If I need a contract vehicle for part-time work once I am retired, I understand how to move forward and align with MBO Partners if that turns out to be my best option.
Thank you for the follow up.
- Rich
